featured_videos.editorial_title: Dr. Ken Berry Spits the Hard Truth About Carnivore, GLP-1s, Coffee & Dairy
featured_videos.commentary: Another absolute gem from Dr. Ken Berry that cuts through the nonsense health "experts" have been selling us for decades. He's not just talking theory - he's sharing real-world insights about how traditional medical advice has been totally backwards when it comes to nutrition and metabolic health. For anyone feeling frustrated with mainstream diet recommendations, this video is like finding a roadmap out of nutritional confusion, especially if you're curious about carnivore or low-carb approaches that actually work for real people's bodies.

featured_videos.editorial_title: Lion Diet Week 2 & 3 Check in & LIVE Q&A with Jenny Mitich
featured_videos.commentary: Look, the carnivore world is buzzing about Jenny's self-experiment, and for good reason. She's doing what most nutrition researchers won't: actually tracking real-world metabolic changes through personal testing. Seeing someone document their journey with hard data. not just anecdotes. gives the community serious credibility and helps people understand how diet can impact their individual health markers.

featured_videos.editorial_title: This Is Boring, But Destroys Your Visceral Fat in 14 Days
featured_videos.commentary:
Okay, here's the take:

Look, I know another "fat loss" video might sound played out, but this one's different. Bella's breaking down how tiny tweaks can totally transform your health journey - and it's not just about what's on your plate. The comments are fire: people are seeing real results, from weight loss to clearing up skin issues, just by getting strategic about their carnivore approach. It's wild how something as simple as timing your meals or cutting certain proteins can make such a massive difference.

featured_videos.editorial_title: Whole Foods EXPOSED: 7 Meats I’ll NEVER Buy Here Again!
featured_videos.commentary: Real talk: This video is exactly why carnivore folks need to be smart shoppers. The breakdown of hidden ingredients and processed "meat" products at Whole Foods is eye-opening, showing how even so-called "healthy" stores can trick you with sketchy food manufacturing. Some people might think they're making great choices, but without understanding what's actually in their cart, they're just feeding themselves industrial junk instead of real nutrition. I'm glad creators like Steak and Butter Gal are pulling back the curtain on food marketing tricks that can seriously mess with your metabolic health.

featured_videos.editorial_title: My Dad and I Share Our Carnivore Regrets
featured_videos.commentary: Emma's latest video drops some serious truth bombs about her carnivore journey. Her raw conversation with her dad about what they'd do differently cuts through the noise and shows how real people actually handle dietary shifts. The most powerful moment? Their honest take on how small diet cheats can mess with your mental and physical performance. If you're thinking about carnivore or feeling stuck, this video is your roadmap to making smarter choices.

featured_videos.editorial_title: $17 Carnivore Bar vs $1.60 Homemade Carnivore Bar
featured_videos.commentary: The carnivore world just got a budget-friendly makeover with this DIY bar tutorial. Emma's breakdown of making a $1.60 homemade version of a $17 store bar is exactly the kind of practical kitchen hack our community needs. It's not just about saving money, but understanding the roots of traditional foods like pemmican, which Native Americans perfected as a nutrient-dense, long-lasting survival food. Smart cooking meets ancestral wisdom. now that's a win for anyone serious about whole food nutrition.
